instructions: To make the pastry, measure the flour into a bowl and rub in the butter... Bake for about 35 minutes. If the almonds seem to be browning too quickly, cover the tart loosely with foil.
Grease a 1 litre/2 pint pie dish with butter... Place the dish into the oven and bake for 30-40 minutes, or until the custard has set and the top is golden-brown.
Put the mushrooms into a food processor... Bake for 20 minutes, then lower the oven setting to 180C and cook for another 15 mins. Allow to rest before slicing.
Rinse the eggplant and roast it on an open flame... Stir and saut√© for some more 4 to 5 minutes more. Garnish with coriander leaves.
Prepare the brisket and sear it... Slice the meat across the grain and serve with vegetables and gravy.
Cook the broccoli and carrots... Serve with Yorkshire puddings, gravy, and roast potatoes.
